items.sentence: Tom wasn't aware that he was being followed.
Tom is reading the novel that Mary gave him.
That didn't turn out the way I wanted it to.
I see that you've bought yourself a new hat.
There were a lot of people there to meet us.
Why do you think Tom was reluctant to dance?
Would you like to leave Tom another message?
Do you want me to help you take care of Tom?
Do you want me to help you count this money?
Do you want me to come and keep you company?
Do you really think doing that would be fun?
Tom and Mary were both completely exhausted.
We shouldn't have been permitted to do that.
I really need to take care of some business.
I see you had to work late again last night.
I spent the whole night tossing and turning.
I think I've understood everything you said.
I think there's something we're overlooking.
I told you this was going to be interesting.
I wanted to talk to you about what happened.
